author: @@scoopearth1
title: Securing Your Home: The Role of a Residential Locksmith
text:
Feeling secure in our own homes is something most of us take for granted. We assume that the locks on our doors and windows will keep out intruders and protect our families and belongings. However, even the best security measures can fail over time without proper maintenance and upgrades. This is where a knowledgeable
 residential-locksmith can make all the difference in keeping our castles safe and sound.
A residential locksmith specializes in the locks, keys, and security systems that protect our homes. When we find ourselves locked out or the victim of a break-in, they are the experts we call for help. But locksmiths do far more than just letting us back into the house or installing new locks after a burglary. They are essentially home security consultants who can assess potential vulnerabilities in our existing set-up and recommend appropriate safeguards.
Table of Contents
Home Lockouts
Getting locked out of the house is easily one of the most frustrating experiences for any homeowner. Not only are you stranded outside your own home, but there is also potential damage if you try to force your way inside. A residential locksmith can swiftly come to your location with the specific tools and knowledge to gain entry into your property without any lasting damage. They can pick open most lock types or drill out the lock cylinder entirely and replace it with a new matching lock so you can get back inside quickly. Some locksmiths even offer emergency after-hours services for desperate lockout situations.
Key Duplication
Over time, house keys can wear down through repeated use or get misplaced altogether. Rather than replace all your locks, residential locksmiths can duplicate your existing keys. They have the key-cutting machines and blank key stocks necessary to make accurate new copies so you don’t have to worry about losing access. They can even duplicate transponder car keys designed to work with computer chip ignition systems. If you’ve lost your only house key, any pieces left behind inside the lock cylinder can also be used to fabricate a replacement key.
Lock Repair
General wear and tear on locks is inevitable in any home as the components gradually degrade over the years. Issues like sticking or jamming locks not only create access frustration but also render the lock less effective for security. Your local locksmith has the knowledge to take locks apart, troubleshoot issues, replace any faulty components, and put them back together as good as new. This avoids the higher costs of fully replacing the locks. It also restores smooth latching functionality for ease of use.
Deadbolt Installation
Deadbolts are secondary locks installed alongside main entry knobs or handles for added security. When properly installed, the bolt extends into the door frame to prevent the door from opening even if the main lock is compromised. Your residential locksmith can add high-quality deadbolts to exterior doors around your home for greater peace of mind. They will carefully measure for a proper fit, drill out holes, and attach both halves securely so the deadbolt aligns smoothly for locking and unlocking. Upgrading to deadbolts is one of the most affordable and effective ways to reinforce home security.
Master Key Systems
For homes with many exterior doors or numerous family members coming and going, managing lots of different keys can be a hassle. This is where master key systems come in handy. Your locksmith can re-key or replace multiple locks around your home to work on two levels. Each lock has its own unique key that only opens that one door. But the master key works on all the locks in the system, so you have the convenience of a single key for the whole property. This also lets you grant access to certain individuals like house cleaners without having to provide keys for everything.
Smart Locks
Home security technology continues to advance with clever IoT devices like smart locks. These locks allow you to control and monitor entry remotely via smartphone. You can let in guests even when away from home by unlocking the door right from an app. Smart locks also integrate with home automation systems and some even have built-in cameras for added security monitoring. A tech-savvy residential locksmith can properly outfit your doors with these next-gen access systems and help you configure the settings to your needs.
Door Knob Replacement
Over years of twisting and pulling, interior door knobs will eventually loosen up and require replacement to keep doors latching properly. Loose knobs can also create security risks by not keeping doors fully closed. It’s a fairly straightforward project for a DIYer but best left to a professional locksmith. The right tools and parts on hand make the process smoother. And locksmith training ensures the new hardware fits right for optimum security.
High-Security Locks
For homeowners concerned about break-in risks, there are special high-security locks made to withstand dedicated burglary attacks. These locks embed hardened steel plates around the bolt making them extremely drill and pick resistant. Installing these upgraded locks usually requires special preparation of the door and door jamb first to reinforce the entire entry point. A knowledgeable residential locksmith has the expertise to properly outfit doors with the right-strength locks for your security needs.
Broken Key Extraction
It’s Murphy’s Law that your house key would break off inside the lock when you need to get inside urgently. Don’t fret and try to dig it out yourself as this can damage the lock cylinder beyond repair. Your residential locksmith has special broken key extractors that can carefully fish out the snapped key chunk without scratching up the locking mechanism. The lock cylinder can then be replaced or re-pinned back to working order so you have a fully functioning lock and key again.
Lock Re-Keying
Re-keying locks is a fast and affordable way to boost security after moving into a new home. Rather than go through the hassle and expense of replacing all the locks, a locksmith can reconfigure the existing interior and exterior locks to work with new keys. The old keys will then no longer open the re-keyed locks. This prevents past tenants or even previous owners from potentially accessing your property with their old keys still in hand. Re-keying literally transforms the locks to like-new security instantly.
Safe Installation
For storing valuables like jewelry, cash, or important documents, homeowners often turn to secured floor or wall safes. Getting quality safe professionally installed ensures maximum security and proper operation. It may involve cutting into drywall or concrete to embed anchors firmly into structural framing. An experienced residential locksmith has the expertise to handle the necessary materials and modifications during safe installation. They can then dial in the combination or program digital locks to the owner’s specifications.
Security Upgrades
There are always new advancements happening in home security technology. Upgrading locks, adding surveillance systems, installing smart home devices – a locksmith keeps up with the latest products and techniques. They can survey your home to find weak spots in entry points, lighting issues, camera blind spots, and other areas needing improvement. An expert assessment leads to targeted recommendations for security upgrades specific to risks and problem areas in your house.
Window Locks
While doors tend to get more security attention, windows can be just as vulnerable for break-ins. Thankfully, there are a variety of specialty window lock products suitable for different window types. From latch locks and guard locks to dowels and pins, an experienced residential locksmith knows which solutions work best for sliding, casement, double-hung, and other window styles. They can advise and properly install suitable window locks to eliminate these overlooked entry points from your home security worries.
Keyless Entry
Fumbling for keys to unlock doors is annoying as well as insecure if you accidentally leave keys unattended. Keyless entry systems are a convenient, key-free way to access your property. With just a passcode, fingerprint scan, or radio keyfob, exterior doors unlock instantly. Residential locksmiths can outfit doors with keypad, biometric, or wireless locks tailored to your access control preferences. Going keyless boosts both security and convenience for homeowners. It also eliminates the ongoing costs of making duplicate keys over time.
Emergency Locksmith Services
When locks fail unexpectedly, it’s good to keep your local 24-hour residential locksmith’s number handy. Reputable locksmiths offer emergency after-hours services when desperate situations arise needing immediate lock repairs or replacements. Nobody wants to leave doors unsecured overnight or to pay steep weekend callout fees from general handymen who lack the specialized tools, parts, and skills that locksmiths have. Knowing you have a trusted residential locksmith ready for emergencies provides peace of mind amid crisis scenarios.
This overview covers just some of the lock-related issues and upgrades residential locksmiths routinely handle to keep homeowners safe. With a reliable locksmith already on call, before you have a crisis, you can rest easy knowing your castle is safe. Reach out to a licensed local residential locksmith today to discuss a security assessment and how they can help protect your family and home.

author: Alejandro Rincón
title: Deadpool es el nuevo dueño del Club Deportivo La Equidad
text:
Resumen: El Club Deportivo La Equidad ha sido adquirido por un grupo inversor norteamericano liderado por Al Tylis y Sam Porter, con la participación del actor Ryan Reynolds. Esta nueva etapa promete inversiones en las fuerzas básicas y el fútbol femenino, generando gran expectativa entre los hinchas.
En la mañana de este jueves, 16 de enero, se conformó que el grupo inversor norteamericano Tylis-Porter Group, es el nuevo dueño del Club Deportivo La Equidad.
A través de un comunicado, se informó que La Equidad ha pasado a ser propiedad del fondo de inversión de Al Tylis y Sam Porter.
El proceso se llevó a cabo con éxito y ya cuenta con la aprobación de la División Mayor del Fútbol Colombiano.
“Esta alianza marca el inicio de una estrategia clara y sostenible que nos permitirá seguir creciendo”, indica la comunicación oficial.
Al Tylis y Sam Porter asumirán como Co-Presidentes de nuestra Junta Directiva, junto con el señor Nicolás Maya, mientras que el presidente, Carlos Mario Zuluaga, continuará liderando la gestión del club.
Los nuevos propietarios están comprometidos a invertir en áreas clave, incluyendo las Fuerzas Básicas y el equipo femenino, pilares fundamentales de la institución.
Al Tylis, indicó que «es un honor formar parte de este gran club», al tiempo que agregó que «queremos que todos nuestros hinchas se sientan orgullosos”.
Por su parte, Sam Porter añadió que «estamos convencidos de que el futuro de La Equidad será brillante”.
Para el inversionista, “Bogotá es una ciudad increíble, llena de oportunidades para crecer y alcanzar grandes éxitos. Ser parte de este proyecto y de esta hinchada nos llena de entusiasmo».
Uno de los socios de los nuevos dueños del Club Deportivo La Equidad es el actor Ryan Reynolds, quien interpretó al singular Deadpool.
La venta, según se ha filtrado, se habría hecho por una cifra cercana a los 126 mil millones de pesos.
Más noticias de Deporte
Librepensador. Amante de la fotografía, la escritura, la radio y el detrás de cámaras. Periodista por pasión hace 25 años, abogado de profesión. Amante del trabajo de campo, la reportería, la calle.

author: Super
title: Como foi escolhida a trilha sonora de "Ainda Estou Aqui"?
text:
Desde que estreou nos cinemas brasileiros, em novembro de 2024, Ainda Estou Aqui virou uma febre. O filme ainda não saiu das salas de cinema, e sua trilha sonora definitivamente não saiu dos fones dos espectadores: uma playlist com todas as músicas foi salva por 38 mil contas no Spotify, e a canção É Preciso Dar Um Jeito, Meu Amigo entrou na parada de músicas virais do serviço de streaming, dois anos depois da morte de seu intérprete, Erasmo Carlos.
A trilha sonora de Ainda Estou Aqui também conta com músicas clássicas da Tropicália de Tom Zé, Gal Costa e Os Mutantes, hits de Tim Maia e Roberto Carlos e canções de clássicos internacionais da época como o casal Jane Birkin e Serge Gainsbourg.
Além das músicas, o filme tem uma trilha instrumental original composta pelo australiano Warren Ellis, parte da banda de rock Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds.
Escolher uma trilha sonora não é só fazer uma playlist. As músicas precisam encaixar na cena, ter letras que façam sentido – várias se relacionam diretamente com o roteiro em Ainda Estou Aqui – e conversar emocionalmente com o filme. A trilha do longa foi cuidadosamente escolhida a oito mãos pelo editor Affonso Gonçalves, pelos roteiristas Heitor Lorega e Murilo Hauser, e pelo diretor Walter Salles.
Gonçalves, que trabalha recorrentemente como editor em filmes dos diretores Todd Haynes e Jim Jarmusch, conversou com a Super para explicar o processo de escolha da trilha sonora de Ainda Estou Aqui.
Nos bastidores da trilha sonora Algumas canções foram escolhidas para fazer parte de Ainda Estou Aqui antes mesmo do filme começar a ser gravado. No roteiro de Lorega e Hauser, algumas músicas já tinham sido sugeridas, como Jimmy, Renda-Se , do Tom Zé e Je t’aime moi non plus , de Jane Birkin e Serge Gainsbourg.
Continua após a publicidade Outra ideia que veio dos roteiristas foi usar canções de Roberto Carlos, artista com um relacionamento complexo com a ditadura militar. Ele ajudou a compor músicas de protesto, como a brilhante É Preciso Dar Um Jeito, Meu Amigo , visitou Caetano Veloso no exílio (para quem escreveu como homenagem Debaixo dos Caracóis dos seus Cabelos) , e era adorado pelos tropicalistas perseguidos. Mesmo assim, ele também recebeu honrarias militares e cantou nas Olimpíadas do Exército.
“Tanto os roteiristas como o Walter resolveram usar o Roberto também por essa contradição”, explica Gonçalves. “Eles ouviam porque era o que tocava no rádio na época”, como dá para perceber em cenas onde o rádio é ligado e a voz do cantor aparece imediatamente.
Compartilhe essa matéria via: Outro momento que já tinha a trilha sonora mais ou menos delimitada no roteiro é a cena em que as crianças estão dançando e Rubens Paiva (interpretado por Selton Mello) troca o disco e coloca Take Me Back To Piauí , do compositor e humorista Juca Chaves, para tocar. Isso já estava no roteiro, mas Gonçalves e Salles tentaram algumas músicas para mostrar o “contraste de gerações” entre os filhos e os pais. Depois de testar até David Bowie, eles escolheram Alexander , da banda Ten Years After, que não está disponível nos serviços de streaming.
Continua após a publicidade “A grande sorte”, diz Gonçalves, “é que 1971 foi um grande ano para a música brasileira”. Foi possível respeitar a linha do tempo do filme (a primeira parte de Ainda Estou Aqui , durante a ditadura, se passa entre 1970 e 1971), sem escolhas anacrônicas, e pensar no que as pessoas estariam escutando naquele momento.
“Não só as músicas contam um pouco da história daquela época, mas te dão um entendimento dos personagens”, explica Gonçalves. “A Veroca [interpretada por Valentina Herszage] ouve Gal, ela escolhe Os Mutantes para tocar no Super-8 dela em Londres, a Zezé [interpretada por Pri Helena] ouve rádio que toca MPB, Tim Maia, Roberto Carlos […] Você acaba conhecendo um pouco mais de cada um deles através do gosto musical.”
A canção que tem o lugar de maior destaque no filme é o clássico de Erasmo Carlos É Preciso Dar Um Jeito, Meu Amigo , uma das favoritas de Gonçalves do primeiro álbum do Tremendão. A música toca no começo do filme, ajudando a contar o que estava acontecendo no país na época, e nos créditos.
Voltar com a música no fim de Ainda Estou Aqui, enquanto imagens vazias da casa normalmente cheia de vida e risada dos Paiva passam pela tela, é uma forma de reforçar o tema da memória e lembrar a audiência “do tempo em que os sonhos da família, uma casa pra eles, ainda eram possíveis”, segundo Gonçalves.
Continua após a publicidade Há uma única música do século 21 na trilha sonora: a peça instrumental The Fight , que foi composta pelo islandês Jóhann Jóhannsson para a trilha sonora do filme Personal Effects , de 2009. Ela é um resquício da trilha temporária do filme: Gonçalves editou Ainda Estou Aqui com uma trilha sonora provisória, usando composições de Jóhannsson e de Warren Ellis para ter uma ideia inicial de como seria o filme com música.
A música de Jóhannsson combinou tanto com a cena da família saindo do Rio de Janeiro e mudando para São Paulo que eles decidiram mantê-la. O compositor islandês, famoso por trilhas sonoras como de A Teoria de Tudo e A Chegada , faleceu em 2018, então a escolha natural para compor a trilha original para o filme foi o outro nome presente no corte provisório: Warren Ellis, que imediatamente disse sim depois de assistir ao filme.
“Foi um processo longo porque Warren mora em Paris, eu em Los Angeles e Walter no Rio”, explicou Gonçalves. “Quando ele começou a compor a trilha, o Walter e eu estávamos finalizando o filme em LA, eventualmente o Walter foi para Paris e terminou a trilha lá com o Warren.” A obra final, segundo o editor, “eleva o filme” e “te coloca perto dos personagens”.
Ainda Estou Aqui foi indicado aos prêmios de Melhor Filme Internacional, Melhor Atriz e Melhor Filme no Oscar de 2025. Ainda dá tempo de assistir ao filme nos cinemas – e sempre é tempo de ouvir essa trilha sonora de novo.
Continua após a publicidade AS MAIS LIDAS DA SEMANA Toda sexta, uma seleção das reportagens que mais bombaram no site da Super ao longo da semana. Inscreva-se aqui para receber a nossa newsletter Aceito receber ofertas produtos e serviços do Grupo Abril. Cadastro efetuado com sucesso! Você receberá nossas newsletters pela manhã de segunda a sexta-feira.
Publicidade

author: The Canadian Press
title: B.C. to get about $50M in new federal climate solutions funding - Greater Victoria News
text: The federal government is spending $89 million to fund 10 greenhouse gas emission reduction projects as the government works toward the goal of conserving 30 per cent of the country’s land and water by 2030. Environment Minister Steven Guilbeault made the announcement in British Columbia on Thursday, where he said the “evidence of climate change is striking,” referencing extreme weather events including flooding, drought and “devastating” wildfire seasons. “With the goal of reversing biodiversity loss across the country, bit by bit, we’re getting there, protecting prime lands and waters that serve up some of the most important habitats for imperilled species.” He added that the projects are also aiding in the fight against climate change. Guilbeault told the conference in West Vancouver that about $50 million of the funding is slated for major projects in the province. He later noted that some projects have been in the works for some time and have already put that money to use. “Often we will quietly work with organizations and Indigenous nations behind the scenes and then once the project are almost completed, we can make we can make the announcement like we’re doing this morning,” he said Thursday. Among funds already put to use is $37 million for the BC Parks Foundation, which it received through the Nature Smart Climate Solutions Fund. Andrew Day, the foundation’s CEO, told the conference that the project had “already protected” 30 locations, covering about 4,000 hectares of private grasslands, forests and wetlands of Vancouver Island, the Southern Interior and northern B.C. Guilbeault said the project also benefits several species at risk, such as coho salmon, the great blue heron and other migratory birds. The Nature Trust of British Columbia has been allocated $8 million to preserve 552 hectares of “carbon-rich ecosystems” and protect habitats including grasslands, forests and wetlands that are home to at-risk species including the Western toad, Grizzly bears and southern mountain caribou. “Additionally, the project will result in the creation of 11 new protected areas including forest, wet land and grassland habitats on Vancouver Island, the Gulf Islands, the East Kootenay, and in the Cariboo region,” Guilbeault said. The Nuxalk Nation will also receive more than $4 million to protect lands and animals in priority habitats, including the Great Bear Rainforest near Bella Coola. Blair Mack, elected councillor for Nuxalk Nation, called the move a “small but important step toward true reconciliation.” “The Nature Smart Climate Solutions Fund has allowed the Nuxalk Nation the opportunity to purchase culturally significant private lands and take back under control of the nation,” he told the conference. Other projects being funded through the federal Nature Smart Climate Solutions Fund will take place in Alberta, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Ontario, and Quebec. READ ALSO: [B.C. funding will help UVic study impacts of marine climate change](https://www.vancouverislandfreedaily.com/local-news/b-c-funding-will-help-uvic-study-impacts-of-marine-climate-change-7249750)

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season
text: Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season With wind gusts up to 50 mph and intermittent snow showers, being outside for even the shortest span of time was not only freezing, but also miserable. Those who saw the weather throughout the day on Friday, Jan. 12, in and around Summit County were probably inclined to stay inside at all costs. author: Tamara Merida
title: ¡Totalmente gratis! En la CDMX están regalando arbolitos para promover la reforestación | Radio Fórmula
text: Nuestra bella Ciudad de México es una de las ciudades más grandes y pobladas del mundo, sin embargo, actualmente [enfrenta ciertos desafíos ambientales significativos](https://www.radioformula.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/1/decenas-de-peces-mueren-en-una-laguna-de-veracruz-que-ocurrio-fotos-822656.html). Uno de los problemas más críticos, no solo de la ciudad, sino de todo el país y el mundo es la deforestación y la pérdida de áreas verdes, lo que nos lleva a una gran disminución de la calidad del aire, aumento de las temperaturas y reducción de la biodiversidad. Afortunadamente y en contra de estos desafíos, existen diferentes iniciativas que buscan no solo restaurar las áreas verdes, sino también educar a la población sobre la importancia de preservar el medio ambiente. Alcaldía Coyoacán: Llévate de 1 a 5 árboles nativos de la CDMX La temporada de lluvias viene perfecto para este tipo de iniciativas y es que en los viveros de Coyoacán encontraras arbolitos totalmente gratis para ayudar a reforestar y restaurar nuestras áreas verdes en la ciudad. Te pueden regalar de 1 a 5 árboles nativos y solo necesitas llevar tu INE para comprobar que resides en la CDMX. Lo mejor es que puedes elegir entre 10 especies diferentes como cedros, encinos, patulas, pinos y muchos más. - ¿Dónde? Viveros de Coyoacán, Del Carmen, Coyoacán, 04100 Ciudad de México, CDMX. - ¿Cuándo? De lunes a viernes de 8:00 am a 2:00 pm, hasta el mes de septiembre. - ¿Precio? Totalmente gratis, pueden dar hasta 5 árboles por familia. Esta iniciativa es fruto de la Secretaria de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales como parte del Programa de Producción Forestal. Eso sí, la única condición es plantarlos únicamente dentro de la ciudad como en jardineras, camellones, en casa, etc. Si te preguntabas por los beneficios que tiene esta iniciativa, la verdad es que son muchos. Para empezar, los árboles mejoran la calidad del aire, pues actúan como pulmones naturales, filtrando todo aquel contaminante y produciendo más oxígeno. O si no soportaste el calorón que hubo los últimos meses, las áreas verdes también ayudan a reducir las temperaturas, proporcionando sombra y enfriando el ambiente. Así que ya lo sabes, con cada arbolito plantado, se abre una puerta hacia un ambiente mucho más saludable y una mejor calidad de vida para todos. - Con información de TikTok: @pollypottermx.

author: Periodicodaily.com
title: Venerdì 13 dicembre con il maltempo ma la prossima settimana arriva l’anticiclone
text: (Adnkronos) – maltempo oggi sull'Italia con piogge e temporali a causa dell'arrivo di un’intensa perturbazione in questo Venerdì 13 dicembre e aumenta la parascevedecatriafobia: la paura del Venerdì 13. Il nome deriva da parasceve (dal greco paraskeu? ‘preparazione’, negli usi preparazione al sabato, quindi Venerdì) + decatriafobia paura del numero 13.
